By not loading this information, you can save time from the extra unnecessary SQL queries.

trans-unit.source: Issuu
It allows for WordPress to upgrade itself in combination with the wp-admin/includes/update-core.php file.

It also allows for the removal of actions and filters for objects after they change class properties. It is possible to include the property $wp_filter_id in your class and set it to "null" or a number to bypass the workaround. However this will prevent you from adding new classes and any new classes will overwrite the previous hook by the same class.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许在对象改变类属性后删除对象的动作和过滤器。你可以在你的类中包含$wp_filter_id属性,并将其设置为 "null "或一个数字来绕过这个变通方法。然而这将阻止你添加新的类,任何新的类都将覆盖之前的钩子。

trans-unit.source: It also matches stray > characters.
trans-unit.target: 它还与杂散 > 字符匹配。

trans-unit.source: It calls wp_die() with a message indicating that the site is experiencing technical difficulties and a login link to the admin backend. The ‘wp_php_error_message’ and ‘wp_php_error_args’ filters can be used to modify these parameters.
trans-unit.target: 它调用wp_die（）并显示一条消息，指示该站点遇到技术问题，并提供指向管理后端的登录链接。该“wp_php_error_message”和“wp_php_error_args”滤波器可以用来修改这些参数。

trans-unit.source: It can be used to customize the built-in WordPress login form. Use in conjunction with ‘login_head‘ (for validation).
trans-unit.target: 它可用于自定义内置的WordPress登录表单。与“ login_head ”结合使用（用于验证）。

trans-unit.source: It does not check if the user is already a member of the blog before setting their role. If you don’t want to overwrite the role of a user if they are already a member of the blog, use is_user_member_of_blog() to check that first.
trans-unit.target: 在设置用户角色之前，它不会检查用户是否已经是博客的成员。如果您不想覆盖已经是博客成员的用户角色，请使用is_user_member_of_blog（）首先进行检查。

trans-unit.target: 它不能正确测试无效字符。该代码不能区分电子邮件,如123.dot@domain.com。

trans-unit.source: It does not support placing the separator after the title, but by leaving the prefix parameter empty, you can set the title separator manually.

trans-unit.source: It does not support placing the separator after the title, but by leaving the prefix parameter empty, you can set the title separator manually. The prefix does not automatically place a space between the prefix, so if there should be a space, the parameter value will need to have it at the end.
trans-unit.target: 它不支持将分隔符放在标题后面,但只要将前缀参数留空,就可以手动设置标题分隔符。前缀之间不会自动放置空格,所以如果应该有空格,参数值需要在最后有空格。

trans-unit.source: It includes the ‘admin_bar_menu’ action which should be used to hook in and add new menus to the admin bar. That way you can be sure that you are adding at most optimal point, right before the admin bar is rendered. This also gives you access to the $post global, among others.
trans-unit.target: 它包括“ admin_bar_menu”操作，该操作应用于挂接并将新菜单添加到管理栏。这样，您可以确保在呈现管理栏之前就添加了最佳点。这也使您可以访问 $post 全局等等。

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended that you use the ‘pre_get_posts’ action instead, and alter the main query by checking is_main_query().
trans-unit.target: 这是强烈建议您使用“pre_get_posts”行动，而是和改变通过检查主查询is_main_query（） 。

trans-unit.source: Literal percentage signs (%) in the query string must be written as %%. Percentage wildcards (for example, to use in LIKE syntax) must be passed via a substitution argument containing the complete LIKE string, these cannot be inserted directly in the query string. Also see wpdb::esc_like().
trans-unit.target: 查询字符串中的文字百分号（％）必须写为%%。必须使用包含完整LIKE字符串的替代参数传递通配符百分比（例如，用于LIKE语法），不能将这些通配符直接插入查询字符串中。另请参见wpdb :: esc_like（）。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that auto-draft posts get their post_date bumped or status changed to draft to prevent premature garbage-collection.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you give a different key name for the $_POST data key and the actual user meta key. If you use the same key for both, WordPress for some reason empties the value posted under that key and you’ll always get an empty value in $_POST[‘custom_meta_key’]. To prevent this, you may change the text in the html input element name attribute and append a suffix. After changing, you $_POST data for the custom meta field will be accessible in $_POST[‘custom_meta_key_data’] and shall pass the data properly.
trans-unit.target: 确保为$ _POST数据密钥和实际的用户元密钥指定不同的密钥名称。如果两者都使用相同的密钥，则WordPress由于某种原因会清空该密钥下发布的值，并且您总是会在$ _POST ['custom_meta_key']中获得空值。为防止这种情况，您可以更改html输入元素名称属性中的文本并添加后缀。更改后，您可以在$ _POST ['custom_meta_key_data']中访问自定义元字段的$ _POST数据，并将正确传递数据。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to set the priority correctly, such as 999, otherwise the default WordPress filter on this function will run last and override what you set here.
trans-unit.target: 请确保正确设置优先级,比如999,否则这个功能的默认WordPress过滤器将最后运行,并覆盖您在这里设置的内容。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you haven’t passed no_found_rows in query arguments, Otherwise you will receive a 0 value in return.
trans-unit.target: 确保您没有在查询参数中传递no_found_rows，否则您将收到一个0值。
